properties.title: ESA CCI Land Cover Map for Year 2020, Tile S90W180

lccs_class.title: Land Cover Class Defined in the Land Cover Classification System
lccs_class.description: Land cover class per pixel, defined using the Land Cover Classification System developed by the United Nations Food and Agriculture Organization.

classification:classes.name: cropland-1b
classification:classes.description: Cropland, rainfed, tree, or shrub cover

classification:classes.name: cropland-3
classification:classes.description: Mosaic cropland (>50%) / natural vegetation (tree, shrub, herbaceous cover) (<50%)

classification:classes.name: natural-veg
classification:classes.description: Mosaic natural vegetation (tree, shrub, herbaceous cover) (>50%) / cropland (<50%)

classification:classes.name: tree-1
classification:classes.description: Tree cover, broadleaved, evergreen, closed to open (>15%)

classification:classes.name: tree-2
classification:classes.description: Tree cover, broadleaved, deciduous, closed to open (>15%)

classification:classes.name: tree-3
classification:classes.description: Tree cover, needleleaved, evergreen, closed to open (>15%)

classification:classes.name: tree-4
classification:classes.description: Tree cover, needleleaved, deciduous, closed to open (>15%)

classification:classes.name: tree-5
classification:classes.description: Tree cover, mixed leaf type (broadleaved and needleleaved)

classification:classes.name: tree-shrub
classification:classes.description: Mosaic tree and shrub (>50%) / herbaceous cover (<50%)

classification:classes.name: herbaceous
classification:classes.description: Mosaic herbaceous cover (>50%) / tree and shrub (<50%)

classification:classes.name: flooded-tree-1
classification:classes.description: Tree cover, flooded, fresh or brackish water

classification:classes.name: flooded-shrub-herbaceous
classification:classes.description: Shrub or herbaceous cover, flooded, fresh/saline/brackish water

change_count.title: Number of Class Changes
change_count.description: Number of years where land cover class changes have occurred, since 1992. 0 for stable, greater than 0 for changes.

processed_flag.title: Land Cover Map Processed Area Flag
processed_flag.description: Flag to mark areas that could not be classified.

observation_count.title: Number of Valid Observations
observation_count.description: Number of valid satellite observations that have contributed to each pixel's classification.

current_pixel_state.title: Land Cover Pixel Type Mask
current_pixel_state.description: Pixel identification from satellite surface reflectance observations, mainly distinguishing between land, water, and snow/ice.
